definition: white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera
flour/noodles/(of food) soft (not crunchy)/(slang) (of a person) ineffectual/spineless
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc
lit. pale-faced scholar (idiom); young and inexperienced person without practical experience/still wet behind the ears

sentences.english: The Baimianshi uranium ore field is located in South Jiangxi Province.
sentences.chinese: 白面石铀矿田位于江西省南部。

sentences.english: The main course of roughage will surely causes you longer time than the rice and flour.
sentences.chinese: 粗粮的主食吃起来也肯定比白米白面慢。

sentences.english: The way was tough, and one of my friends named Hua Kang looked pale in lips and green in face due to the bumpy and long journey.
sentences.chinese: 一友名华康，不胜长途劳作，唇白面青，倍感失落。

sentences.english: Sometimes I like to eat white flour bun, feel special.
sentences.chinese: 我有时候喜欢吃白面馒头，觉得特地到。

definition: cooking starch/pasty mixture of starch and water
